doc.field: Carey campaign for 1991 IBT presidency general elections: mailers, campaign day articles; articles and materials related to the apparent rebirth of teamsters and loosing of mob control within the union; court documents: transcripts, exhibits, submissions, ect.; 1986 report to the President and the Attorney General: "The Edge: Organized Crime, Business and Labor Unions."
